objects.text:
• Premium betel leaf blend with a sensual twist
• Elegant packaging with gold accents
• Luxurious intimacy enhancing formula
• Perfect for special romantic occasions

product_details.name: NOOKY Ishqiya: Luxurious Intimate Paan Experience
product_details.description:
• Premium betel leaf blend with a sensual twist
• Elegant dark green triangular packaging with gold accents
• Sophisticated palm leaf design elements
• Luxurious intimacy enhancing formula
• Carefully crafted aromatic blend
• Modern take on traditional paan
• Exclusive premium packaging
• Discreet and elegant presentation
• Perfect for special romantic occasions
• Unique sensual experience

banner_details:
The banner conveys a premium, elegant, and luxurious feel with a deep teal background complemented by gold illustrations and accents, creating an opulent atmosphere. The top-left features a prominent heading (`heading`) in bold serif typography, paired with a stylized subtitle (`subheading`) beneath it. A refined tagline (`tagline`) follows, setting the tone of intimacy and luxury. The key features of the product are listed in a concise bulleted format (`description`). A highlighted price (`price`) draws attention in bold gold text, followed by a gold button (`cta_button`) labeled with a clear call-to-action (`cta`). An image of the product (`product_image`) appears floating on the right, integrated with gold wave elements and cosmic dots. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal: `#0A3538`
- Emerald Teal (diagonal section): `#124B50`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Off-gold Accent: `#E8C87E`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases an elegant and luxurious design using a rich, deep teal background (#004C45) that conveys sophistication and mystery. Accentuating this, metallic gold typography and delicate line drawings (#D4A056) create a striking contrast, enhancing readability and drawing attention while maintaining a classy feel. The interplay between the teal and gold gives a sense of opulence and intimacy, aligning with the product's sensual branding. Subtle highlights and shadows on the packaging ensure the colors blend smoothly while retaining sharpness for essential elements. This palette would work well in an advertisement banner, evoking allure, elegance, and premium quality.
